programme.title: Cradle of Lies
programme.desc: Marissa was in a coma while pregnant and wakes up five years later to find that the baby she delivered is gone.

programme.title: Campus Caller
programme.desc: When a university student goes missing, her mother a former cop goes in search for her.

programme.title: Law Of Attraction
programme.desc: A young attorney connects with a nice guy at a wedding and starts to have feelings for him but he turns out to be the opposing counsel.

programme.title: Anna Nicole
programme.desc: Biopic of Anna Nicole Smith, Playmate and TV personality, culminates in a tragic fatal drug overdose.

programme.title: Dear Santa
programme.desc: A privileged woman falls for a soup kitchen owner after reading his 7-year-old daughter's letter to Santa.

programme.title: Coupled Up For Christmas
programme.desc: Pretending to be a couple in order to win over their exes, Tiffany and Peter fall for each other.

programme.title: Too Cool for Christmas
programme.desc: Lindsay thinks she is too cool to be with her family on Christmas. When she ends up delivering presents with Santa himself, she finds out what Christmas really means.

programme.title: Falling For Christmas
programme.desc: While healing from an injury, a figure-skater meets a man who shows her there is more to life than competing.

programme.title: Three Dates to Forever
programme.desc: When John's new dating app pairs him with radio host Maddie, sparks start to fly.

programme.title: New Dogs, Old Tricks
programme.desc: Tinys bar will close unless he pays $17K; customers rally to save it. Meanwhile, Jays hazing alarms.

programme.title: Buried Secrets
programme.desc: A cop-turned-writer creates suspicion when she publishes her first novel.

programme.title: From Italy with Amore
programme.desc: In the quest to find her dream man, Ariel meets Daniel who shows that food is the way to her heart.

programme.title: Eat, Love, London
programme.desc: Stella takes a job at a new London restaurant and ends up falling for the chef.

programme.title: A Royal Makeover
programme.desc: When Ramone discovers he is about to be King, he takes lessons from royal expert Angelica.

programme.title: Courage
programme.desc: Jason Priestley stars in this inspirational adventure story about courage, love and the power of family.

programme.title: Accidentally In Love
programme.desc: Edie discovers love in London days before leaving for the US. Fate reunites them six years later.

programme.title: Love In Bloom
programme.desc: A florist's trip to Australia finds new meaning in life through a local inns beautiful gardens.

programme.title: A Cape Cod Christmas
programme.desc: A children's author hosts one last Christmas dinner before selling the family home but finds a way to save the home when reuniting with a former ex.

programme.title: The Gay Deceivers
programme.desc: Danny and Elliot avoid military service by pretending to be gay, but they have to act the part when the recruiting officer doesn't buy it.

programme.title: Christmas Evil
programme.desc: In this comedic horror movie, a toymaker tries to make the Christmas spirit a reality, becoming obsessed with the behavior of children and the quality of the toys he makes. When he is met with hypocrisy and cynicism, he snaps and goes on a killing spree.
